headline: AI data centers' massive demand for aluminum is crushing the US aluminum industry

headline: North America Business Software and Services Market Report 2025-2033 by Software, Service, Deployment, Enterprise, End Use, Countries and Company Analysis
summary: North America's Business Software and Services Market is projected to surge from US$ 217.39 billion in 2024 to US$ 514.7 billion by 2033, with a CAGR of 10.05%. Key growth drivers include digital transformation, cloud adoption, AI, automation, and remote workforce solutions. The rising demand for cloud computing, cybersecurity, and data analytics is fueled by SMB technology adoption and regulatory compliance needs. This growth presents robust opportunities for specialized IT solutions. Challenge

headline: Should Major Data Center Contracts and Expansion Plans Prompt Action From Energy Transfer (ET) Investors?
summary: In recent weeks, Energy Transfer announced several major natural gas supply agreements with leading AI data center operators, including Oracle and Fermi, while approving billions of dollars in new pipeline and infrastructure projects funded through 2026. This wave of long-term, fee-based contracts and expansion initiatives positions Energy Transfer to directly tap rising energy demand from the rapid growth of data centers, a trend increasingly linked to the accelerating adoption of...

headline: Is Oracle Corporation (ORCL) One of The AI Stocks Analysts are Betting on?
summary: Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) is one of the AI stocks analysts are betting on. headline: Banks in talks to lend $38 billion to fund sites for OpenAI, FT reports
summary: A ​group of ‌banks is in ‌talks to lend another $38 billion for ⁠Oracle ‌and data centre builder Vantage ‍to fund further sites for OpenAI,​ the ‌Financial Times reported on Friday, citing people familiar with ⁠the matter. Reuters ​could not immediately verify the ‍report.
